name: Watch the Bomb
description: This game is called Watch the Bomb and it is based on pack man, but you need to watch out for the bombs and the black ans colored enemy they will kill you.  There will be shields, coins, cleaner and lives for you that you can pick up as you play the game. you will start with 3 life's.  With the cleaner they will get rid of all of the bombs and enemies so you can get to the food and coins. once you have ran out of life's you will obviously die because you have no life to keep playing the game. Little hit there will be a piece of food that you can eat and it will never leave the game and it will give you life's,coins shields and cleans.
